doc.field: Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records

This series contains ephemera from 1934 to 1973. Materials include several souvenir programs, including a 1934 visit of Vasa members to Stockholm (in Swedish); the golden anniversary celebrations of Nobel #64, 1954 and New York District Lodge #4, 1952; and the 23rd and 25th Conventions of the Grand Lodge of the Vasa Order of America, 1954 and 1962. Other materials include a large, hardcover Vasa songbook in Swedish from 1947; a newspaper clipping; several pieces of promotional material from the Scandinavian restaurant and banquet hall "Iceland"; a card with song lyrics in Swedish; a funeral card and service for a deceased member; blank order forms for Vasa merchandise; and two photographs. Also, one certificate from this series is housed in the oversize box.
Brooklyn and Bronx lodges of the Vasa Order of America records
